plot: Piano Dog, along with his jazz band and some friends, venture down into the Underworld to try and rescue Lovely Rita - the kidnapped cow.
title: Piano Dog Visits the Underworld
plot_es: Piano Dog, along with his jazz band and some friends, venture down into the Underworld to try and rescue Lovely Rita - the kidnapped cow.
plot_en: Piano Dog, along with his jazz band and some friends, venture down into the Underworld to try and rescue Lovely Rita - the kidnapped cow.
